select nvl(sum(to_Number(t.actual_quote)), 0) as applyQuotaSum from customer_application_info t, basic_customer_information b where t.customer_id = b.id and t.status='succeed'
and t.modified_time>to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.modified_time<to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and b.user_id = #{customerManagerId}

select count(1) as countNumber from customer_application_info t, basic_customer_information b where t.customer_id = b.id and t.status='succeed' and t.modified_time>to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.modified_time<to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.user_id = #{customerManagerId}
select count(1) from manager_risk_warning t where t.customer_manager_id=#{customerManagerId} and return_receipt='0'
select count(1) from ACCOUNTABILITY_RECORD t where t.customer_manager_id=#{customerManagerId} and t.Audit_status='notaudit'
select count(1) from product_attribute t where t.created_by=#{customerManagerId} and t.status='unpublished'
